reviews.text: Server Bethany was excellent as well as the food. Atmosphere was on point, will come againâ€¦
Bethany was awesome and service was great
Korine provided great service!
Very satisfied.  Waitress was very good.
Do you want more 5-star Google reviews? Best of all, theyâ€™re free! We can provide as many as you need to help your business reach the top of Google Maps. Contact us on Telegram: @gthisjpeg
Our server kayla Starr was fantastic

Great service from Kayla Starr great food for my 1st time
Antoinette
Kayla was our server and absolutely amazing! The food was so good! Perfect â€œHappy Hourâ€ before going to our show!

BEWARE - this restaurant will rip you off!! I booked a private event, asked for maximum capacity, DOUBLED the required spend minimum through drinks and gratuity, CLOSED the account on site (with manager on duty) and today they made an UNAUTHORIZED charge to my card based on guaranteed guests on contract. DO NOT COME HERE
Kayla Starr was an excellent waitress. She was attentive and made sure we had everything we needed. This was my first time at STK and Iâ€™ll definitely be back. Thank you Kayla :)

Star was amazing! She was super helpful and went above and beyond to make my birthday feel special. She made sure I had a great experience from start to finish. Thank you, Star, for making my day extra memorable and special.
Our waitress Kayla was great!
Amazing service from chelsian she came to check in on us plus good vibes thank you so much ğŸ˜Š
The food and drinks were amazing! I didnâ€™t know what to order and Chelsian gave great recommendations! She was amazing and attentive. 10/10 recommend coming back.
I came here for my anniversary with my bf and Nyasia was the best hostess! Incredible service, polite, and speedy. Loved it!
Great food great steak  chelsian Lennyâ€™s take out time wasnâ€™t rushed! All smiles and we were celebrating a good night

had an amazing experience tonight thanks to our waitress, Chelsian. From the moment we sat down, she was friendly, professional, and genuinely attentive without ever feeling overbearing. She made great recommendations, checked in at just the right times, and kept everything running smoothly the entire evening. You could tell she truly cared about making sure we had a great night.
I had an amazing time here and Nyasia was such a great server. I had her last time as well and itâ€™s always a pleasure to be served by her.
Nyasia was great
Nyasia was awesome.

We had a very nice meal. Our server Mikaela was so kind and accommodating. Service was excellent.  Our dinner was very good. We especially enjoyed the steak frites, crispy brussel sprouts and the chocolate cake.  In addition, my husband loved his wine.  We would definitely return.

Food was horrible. Over $600 meal for nasty surf n turf.   It was definitely not filet.  It was a chewy, fatty piece of meat.  Lobster tail was slimy,  I couldnâ€™t even eat it.  Lobster Mac and cheese tasted like fast food. My Cesar salad was ok until I got my entree shoved at me while I was still eating the salad. Then check came without asking if we wanted coffee/dessert. We were clearly being rushed out. I will not be returning to STK midtown or any other STK restaurant.
Chelsian was our waitress for the night and she was well mannered and made sure our experience was worth it. 10/10
Our waitress Chelsea was awesome, she provided supers service. She made this visit an exceptional experience, and my birthday spent with STK was amazing! I will definitely be back again.
Micaela was awesome! She was super attentive and helpful with making suggestions. Amazing service!
Celebrated my best friend's birthday and the experience was an amazing one. Shout out to Firuza for her excellent service, recommendations and smile. I will definitely be back!

FIRUZA WAS ABSOLUTELY AWESOME. HER ATTENTION TO DETAIL WAS ON POINT AND MADE SURE EVERY STEP OF MY BIRTHDAY DINNER WAS EXECUTED FLAWLESSLY.

THANK YOU!!!
FIRUZA WAS ABSOLUTELY  AWESOME,  VERY ATTENTIVE AND HER SERVICE WAS EXCELLENT...I HOPE TO COME BACK AND HAVE HER AS MY SERVER...FOOD AND DRINKS WERE GREAT AS WELL.
FIRUZA WAS AMAZING. She was accommodating, made great recommendations and made our visit fantastic. I would highly recommend.
Our server Chelsian was great, food was awesome and good atmosphere!
Place is got great food and amazing service. Chelsian was a phenomenal waitress!
Chelsian was a great waitress and the vibes were on point. Highly recommend coming to this place.

We were in town celebrating birthdays and taking in a broadway show. Stopped at STK for dinner and food and service was amazing. Our waitress, Korine did a great job. She was attentive, and throughly explained the menu and specials. The ambiance was nice and the DJ did a good job of mixing up the music. We'll definitely be back.
Good was amazing FIRUZA
FIRUZA was amazing and attentive to our every needs
FIRUZA WAS A GREAT AT TAKING CARE OF ME HERE!
Korine was the best. Amazing atmosphere! Amazing food! Great birthday experience.
Raheem was top tier. He made our night special. Great food great atmosphere thank you all
MIKAELA IS THE BEST WAITRESS HANDS DOWN ! ITâ€™S HER OR NO ONE !
Raheim was the best server I ever had ,.,he was funny.. curious... helpful and professional and proficient...I highly recommend him
Radio Raheem love him!  Very knowledgeable about menu!  Best personality â¤ï¸
Come see Raheim!! Best service ever!!

First let me say the service from Mikaela was exceptional. If I could give 5 stars for just the service I would. The food was very mid for the price point but thatâ€™s to be expected with an STK tbh. The atmosphere felt very Miami with the DJ and fake cherry blossom oversized bouquets and purple lighting. Very first time eating at a â€œniceâ€ restaurant before prom vibes. I wonâ€™t be visiting again but it wasnâ€™t horrible for a steakhouse near Times Square. But if you do go- request Mikaela she was wonderful.
Me and my husband visited this location for happy hour. Mikaela was amazing and super friendly.

Went for happy hour on a Saturday afternoon. Very uncrowded, got a table for 7 within minutes. The happy hour deals are super good. Amazing tater tots and burger for $12? In this economy?? Crazy town. Give it a try

Jerrika was a perfect host!!
Jerika is amazing thank you for your great service
I enjoyed my time at STK. friendly staff, especially our server Sergei. Made sure our experience was special and was very attentive
Sergei was a wonderful and kind host, food was amazing, great environment

Iâ€™m extremely disappointed with my recent experience at STK Midtown. I had planned this dinner to celebrate my birthday before undergoing surgery â€” a moment that meant a lot to me both emotionally and personally.
I reached out ahead of time via email, letting the team know it was my birthday, that Iâ€™m a psychology student taking time off school due to surgery, and that this dinner would be especially meaningful. I requested a customized menu (which STK is known for) and even offered to pay extra. My email was read â€” but never acknowledged or replied to.
When we arrived, we were given poor seating, and while they did give me a free dessert for my birthday, it felt rushed and obligatory. There was no effort to personalize the experience despite the clear communication beforehand. Honestly, they couldâ€™ve kept the dessert â€” it didnâ€™t feel special at all.
To make matters worse, a fight broke out in the restaurant during our dinner and escalated to the point where police had to intervene. It completely killed any sense of celebration or comfort.
We spent over $500 for three people, and for that kind of bill, I expected a high-end experience with attentive service and a respectful acknowledgment of the occasion. What I got was chaotic, impersonal, and disappointing.
I would not recommend this location for any special occasion. STK promises an upscale experience, but they do not deliver â€” especially when it matters most.

Visited STK with a friend on my last night in the city. I was pleasantly surprised at the music ğŸ¶ I heard coming out of the restaurant. It was a nice vibe. In the lobby of the restaurant they have a nice lighted signage and a stand that takes your picture. That is so cute to me. The waiter was cool. The vibes and food were great. I would definitely attend again.

Unika B. & Co.

Where to start!? From the moment we walked in we were greeted with a warm welcome and sat quickly to our table. The whole atmosphere is just beautiful!! Our waitress Firuza, was nothing short of spectacular!! She was so attentive and quick to notice our every need. But more importantly she was sooo kind and genuinely cared about our entire experience. She is amazing at her job!!! Thank you Firuza! Our food was phenomenal!! My steak was cooked to perfection and the garlic bone marrow butter to top it was ğŸ¤¤ chefs kiss* My wife had the shrimp scampi which was also a delight and very fresh! But the appetizer wagu potstickers....omg!! I could of ate 30 of them. If they have them, get them! The selection of drinks/cocktails is vast. We obviously had to try a few, and we were not disappointed! I highly recommend the Cucumber Stiletto! Very refreshing, especially after a huge steak! During our visit one of the managers(Seline)came over to just see how we were and if we were enjoying ourselves. Normally this wouldn't be a big deal. But we had already seen her in action the entire time we were there and could see how much she cared about her job, but more importantly about how everyone was enjoying their experience. She was genuine, kind, and extremely professional! Which if you know anything about NYC, this isn't common. We will be back solely because of Firuza and Seline. Not to mention the food is fantastic which is a nice bonus. We'll see you guys in September for our 1 year wedding anniversary!!! Thank you for an amazing night out and the wonderful experience!! Ethan and Evee.

I came here for my anniversary dinner and did not expect what we experienced. Itâ€™s great that they offer a DJ to play music, but I couldnâ€™t even hear my husband talk during our dinner because the music was so loud and he kept blasting sirens every 10 minutes? It ruins the immersion that you are there with your person and are reminded you are there with everyone else. The food was good, however for what we ordered it felt very overpriced. We had 1 steak to share, 10pcs of shrimp, 1 lobster tail, side of Mac & cheese and two drinks which came out to $400 plus. The Atmosphere didnâ€™t give fine dining for the amount to be that high especially for what we ordered. There was a moment where all the waiters gave free shots to everyone in the restaurant but now I believe the shots were part of the price being so high and put it with the price of our food. It seems like we were robbed of our money and time when I can go to another steakhouse, get the same meal but in a much bigger portion for less the price, and actually hear my partner speaking to me. We wanted to try something different coming here and did not like it. Iâ€™m sure people would like the spot for a birthday event but definitely not something intimate with your forever partner, even more so with it being very overpriced. Menus felt very misleading. Not to mention our waitress was hovering over my partner watching him put in his tip amount for her to which she said â€œcash is betterâ€. If we donâ€™t have cash, weâ€™re gonna give you whatever we have in our card. Didnâ€™t like that at all.

Went for dinner with my family and we had a wonderful experience. The food was delicious from start to finish. I thoroughly enjoyed the shrimp scampi, it was so full of flavor. The steak was perfectly cooked and every bite was satisfying. Everything pictured was just great!

Service by Hector and Christian was exceptional. They were very friendly, attentive, and provided us with great recommendations. They went above and beyond to make sure we had everything we needed and really made us feel taken care of.

Overall, the food, drinks, and service were all outstanding!

We went for dinner on a Sunday night. Daria and her partner were great servers; they are knowledgeable of the menu; and was pleasant.. My daughter and I were satisfied with the service. The place is beautiful.  We took some awesome pictures.  The food was good; not spectacular but comparable to other spots in times Square.

We had a wonderful dinner at STK on Friday night. Chelsian was our waitress, and she was attentive and personable! Very friendly! Our food came out promptly and was delicious. She had great dinner and drink reservations. I had the spicy watermelon cocktail. The DJ was fun and the restaurant had a great vibe. We recommend for a nice night out.

From the very beginning, the experience was lack luster and border line disrespectful. The younger hostess was rude and short with me and my friend. We had reservations but there was a private party inside the restaurant so there was only outdoor seating. That was ok but how everything else was handled poorly.

The hostess stated â€œsit in any two seated table and Iâ€™ll bring you menus.â€ Huh? Isnâ€™t this an upscale restaurant- shouldnâ€™t she have walked us to the table with menus??
She didnâ€™t, and never gave us menus for almost 5 mins. We had to flag another slightly older hostess that we needed menus.
Finally received menus, a few minutes later a server a bit aloof asked if we were being helped, which we hadnâ€™t yet. We were able to order some happy hour items- calamari, lil burger and truffle fries, short rib quesadillas, and a Cesar salad. All of these were mediocre.

My friend wanted more but the lack of service and poor atmosphere made me want to exit quickly.
This place is a joke, nothing upscale, definitely not fine dining. Spend your money elsewhere which we did.

Walked in to an amazing atmosphere. Our waitress CHELSIAN gave 10/10 service with a smile and laughs to make us feel like we have been there many times before! Amazing seasonal pumpkin ravioli with crab and truffle and pine nuts YALL I was in HEAVEN!

sour server Kayla Star was phenomenal. she was running it like a tight ship. this was my first time and we came for HH and had a fantastic time. side note: bartenders took long with drinks. will be back!!

We came for happy hour around 3:30PM, the bar area was full. We were offered tables behind the bar area, which were good. However the service was not good at all. There was only one server for about 12 tables or more during busy happy hour. It took forever to get drinks or get the servers attention. Server kept disappearing or attending other tables. We had to ask for napkins and utensils. The happy hour food was very good and tasty. To get a second round of cocktails took extremely long. By the end we just wanted the check, then a mistake was made charging one card twice, instead of splitting it. The restaurant didnâ€™t even bother to call back to apologize for the mistake or clarify the issue after speaking with a manager. Overall service 2/10, cocktails 6/10, food 8/10. Seems overhyped and service is certainly lacking. They also offer shots for 5 Star reviews so be aware.

Rahim was our server which made the experience so much better. I asked millions of questions before, he didnâ€™t show a single sign of annoyance. He continually checked on us, and was just a very pleasant server. STK is the place to go when you just want vibes with good food and potentially meet people in the city. I recommend this spot!

On terms of price they hade ok prices and good prices for the happy hiur.

Went here with my best friend Iâ€™m so glad we chose this place! Our waiter Baker was super attentive and even helped us pick out our orders because we were so overwhelmed by all the wonderful choices they had. He checked in on us frequently and when he told us the â€œblue butterâ€ was good he was correct - the blue butter here is something out of this world in the best way possible. I got an espresso martini & we ordered the wagu sliders for an appetizer- they came perfectly cooked & were delicious. My friend got the filet  it was perfectly cooked medium rare, I got the lobster mac and cheese it was rich, and lobster was fresh!  We also got truffle fries! I highly recommend those!! Portions may seem small at first but be warned they are very filling you wonâ€™t go hungry here! For dessert we got the chocolate cake we loved it the chocolate â€œcrunchâ€ pieces they put on top are so good. Overall Iâ€™d say this is a great place to celebrate an intimate special occasion and I would highly recommend coming here. Thank you so much for a wonderful evening!

Decided to pick stk over the usual celebration steak house my family loves to go to and we were in a for a treat. From the moment you walk in you realize the size and class of this restaurant.

We were pleasantly surprised to find a DJ playing in the day time and the tunes were on point .

We were quickly seated though I would have preferred not be seated around the edge instead of a table in the middle considering we were celebrating my wifeâ€™s birthday but nevertheless next time would request seating further deeper into the restaurant.

It was almost fully packed with mix of tourists and locals

The service was wonderful and we ordered some specials but I was saving room for my main meal and glad I did as it was a spectacularly cook porterhouse. Both my wife daughter throughly enjoyed their steaks and drinks .

All in all it was an excellent meal to remember and look forward to our next visit

Kudos to the staff and management
I had a very great time at STK. My server Bethany did a very excellent job and definitely would recommend being served by her. The food was amazing and the atmosphere as well.

I highly recommend this place. Not only for the food but the outstanding service. Our server Mikaila was excellent! . I ordered the rib eye, iceberg salad, potatoes au gratin and the cloud for desert.  Everything was super delicious! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!.

This place is definitely a vibe. The good was delicious and filling. The music vibrant, but not too loud, and our server, Chelsian, was perfectly caring and attentive. A+, and we'll definitely return!

Brandon was amazing so attentive and helpful, gave great recommendations and alterations in the case that certain things werenâ€™t available. The food was great I loved how quick the servers came to clean the tables and pat down anything that wasnâ€™t dry. Food was so great, steak was juicy, I recommend that you order it medium rare and get the garlic butter with it, it was both a show stopper and tasted so delicious. The apps were both refreshing and delicious!
Had a great time at STK! Firuza was our server and made this birthday celebration extra special. She was kind and attentive. Food was great too but small portions for the price.

Had an amazing time at STK in New York celebrating my momâ€™s birthday. Darija served us and she was very accommodating and helpful. Food was amazing, especially the Shrimp Scampi Pasta. Looking forward to coming again!
Raheim and Lacy were awesome!  Great service, professional and fun.  They made our dining experience, wonderful and unforgettable.  We were here for a birthday celebration and they were amazing

I want to start by saying I visited this restaurant twice once in February for my birthday and again in March. My first experience in February was about a 6 in a scale of 1 to 10. The food was good I definitely enjoyed my cowgirl riveted and the crispy Brussels sprouts were so tasty. I asked the waiter to pack my food so I would be able to enjoy it again later. When I went to heat my food the next day I saw that the waiter only packed the steak ğŸ˜¡ğŸ˜¡ğŸ˜¡wth happen to the sides. Why wouldn't you pack all my food to go. I was so pissed I wish I could remember his name i think it was nicko or something. Let's fast forward to march I sat in a totally different area n had a totally different experience 10 out of 10 Jermaine was the absolute best. He was very attentive, gave suggestions great customer service and of course the food was great. I'm glad I went back because JERMAINE Sure changed my mind of wanting to eat there a third time. I would definitely want to sit in his section. It would have been 5 stars but my first experience was not what I expected it to be

This place is absolutely beautiful! I came for happy hour which was great and had really great prices. The mini burger however was kinda dry. The portions were good and the food was hot and fresh. I would say that some kind of fence or divider from the outside public would be great!

My partner and I took a client out for her birthday and honestly we were extremely disappointed by the service and the food. First, we walked in at 9:15 and were seated by 9:20. Someone greeted us and said she would be back in a few minutes to take our order, somehow a few minutes became 35 minutes only for her to return and say â€œno one brought you bread yet?â€ We got bread at 10:01 which I remember vividly because then I asked since itâ€™s past 10, can we order from the Happy Hour menu, to which we were denied because we were seated in the dining area and not the bar. I just ordered ~$450 worth of steak, I didnâ€™t see the issue in allowing us to order some little bites such as tater tots and tacos from the happy hour menu especially since moving to the bar wouldnâ€™t make sense since we werenâ€™t drinking. We moved passed the point of happy hour and waited another half hour for our steaks and sides to come. The corn pudding was the best thing we got, the Japanese Wagyu (strip) was extremely charred and bitter, which was very disappointing because I was raving to my client about that. The tomahawk was decent but the temperature was medium when we asked for medium well. The sides came but no utensils were given for those, we had to constantly try and get our servers attentions. Lastly, the server gives us QR codes and asks us to write her a review in exchange for a bottle of champagne or a round of shots- which made it extremely clear that she paid no attention to us the entire night because we repeatedly told her we donâ€™t drink so she can take the wine glasses and that weâ€™ll stick to water. The cherry on top was us getting a copy of the receipt texted to us and us telling that we were charged incorrectly, but we cannot pin point what we were charged extra for because the receipt doesnâ€™t itemize the food just shows the total. Extremely disappointing
Must come to STK and ask for Raheim!! And Lacey!! Great team. They were wonderful. Made our dining event excellent. Wonderful recommendations!! Our friend Phil had a blast celebrating his birthday.

â€œThe most honest reviewâ€
The restaurant offers free dessert for google review.
Got to be careful about a restaurant with so many reviews, but the service was good, with  DJ, nice vibe.
But the steak was awful! We ordered porterhouse steak with medium rare, I canâ€™t imagine why a â€œsteak houseâ€ in NY could made a steak with this kind of quality, hard, dry, overcooked.
If youâ€™re looking for a good experience, come here but donâ€™t order steak; if youâ€™re looking for a nice steak, better avoid this place.

Update:

In April, I had a less-than-ideal experience during a visit with a party of eight. Fortunately, the manager reached out afterward and truly made things right. My guest and I were invited back for a chefâ€™s tasting, and from start to finish, the hospitality was exceptional. Our server, Brandon, delivered amazing service, and the food was everything we could have hoped for.

I want to sincerely thank the team at STK Midtown for turning a disappointing situation into a truly memorable evening. Your care, attention to detail, and commitment to the guest experience did not go unnoticed. Iâ€™ll definitely be stopping by the next time Iâ€™m in the city. Thank you again!

We had such an amazing experience thanks to our server, Dariya From the moment we sat down, she made us feel welcomed and taken care of. She was incredibly attentive, friendly, and knowledgeable about the menu. Her food recommendation was spot on â€” it ended up being one of the best dishes weâ€™ve ever had! Throughout the entire meal, she checked in at just the right times without ever making us feel rushed. You can tell she genuinely cares about providing excellent service. Weâ€™ll definitely be coming back, and weâ€™ll be asking for her again. Thank you for making our night so enjoyable!
